text: Tokoroga ware no meiryōna shirushi ga, kare-ra ni yomi kikasa reta toki, ware to au koto o nozomanai-sha-tachi wa itta. `Kore to wa betsu no kuruān o motte ki nasai. Soretomo kore o kaizan shi nasai.' Itte yaru ga ī. `Watashi wa jibun no sairyō de kore o kaizan suru koto wa dekinai. Tada, watashi ni keiji sa reta mono ni shitagau dakedearu. Watashi ga moshi omoni somuitanaraba, idaina-bi no chōbatsu o hontōni osoreru
